channel.title: Orical-X - Perfecting skilling!
channel.description:
[center] [ul][IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/14c5o2x.jpg[/img] Hi moparscape, some of you may know a server development I was involved in called Miscellania. I would have loved to have kept on programming the client while X Entinity X was the server sided person. But he seems to have quit on me. And recently, I've realized how [b]terrible[/b] the skilling on Project-Insanity is. My goal for this development is mainly to improve the skilling of my server. I've already been doing this for about a week and I've fixed fishing a tiny bit and I'm working on agility now. So, lets move onto the good stuff.[/center] Goals: [list][li]Make the PI hater's not hate my server :D[/li] [li]atleast 3 skills 90%+[/li] [li][s]Full Karamja agility course[/s][/li] [li]All skills trainable[/li] [li]Great mining[/li] [li]Great Woodcutting[/li] [li]Great fishing[/li] [li]PERFECT Firemaking[/li][/list] The only skills atm that are up to my standards quality wise are smithing and slayer. Skills I plan on improving(no specific order): Fishing - Somewhat done. Agility - Done Mining Cooking [s]Firemaking[/s] - Had to remove this. Woodcutting Farming Atm, i'm working on Agility, as I just finished up the last bits of fishing. Developers log:
[b]March 24, 2011:[/b] Started project Fixed curses, now 95% Added x10 hits + command to turn on and/or off Moved fishing & cooking to fishing guild Fixed the glitch where you got tuna from the lobster spot Implemented a better agility system Started on my own Karamja agility course Made planks, balance rope, log balance, hands hold, monkey bars and the blade thingy work. [b]March 25, 2011:[/b] Not much done today, was playing alot of basket ball Jumping pillars work, along with low wall and swing rope. Recruited the worst beta tester ever, Clawz fury <===8 Balancing ledge works. AMG, finished the agility course! All clickable objects work, I have no intention of adding the ones that arent clickable, as I've already added one and it doesn't even look that great and I can only get it to work in 1 direction. [b]March 27, 2011:[/b] Made the agility course video Made a quick smf forum Fixed all the bugs on agility course Near perfect timers on agility course Added a better starter Disabled following in agility course 2 starters per IP [b]March 28, 2011[/b] Fixed alot of dupes. Still more to go -.- [b]March 29, 2011:[/b] Fixed skill animation while walking. DFS spec now works. [b]Working on a HUGE update. This will either be an awesome break through or an epic failure. If anyone stills reads this i'll pm you details upon request.
Media: [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/a11qo8.jpg[/img] For the blade one, where I'm jumping, I did that really crapy. I made a boolean to detect if the player is within the reach of a blade and it makes them do the jump anim and move +2 squares. I don't know of any better ways to do this atm. [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/16j26fs.jpg[/img] This is actually changable, say if you don't like how it looks on a 474 gameframe, you can turn the orbs off. Or if you want them for pking/monster killing you can easily turn it back on. Client sided command to change it. Also have a command for x10 hits. [size=14pt]WATCH![/size] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gy2dJSiCfbM]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gy2dJSiCfbM[/url] [b]Supporters:[/b] Rash <3 beast k0 <3 AzyreK <3 mr extremez <3 Mendorphins <3 Maikie61 <3 halflive9 <3 Ix Soulcist xI <3 marcbob <3 Clawz fury ~<===8 smokin flax <3 I'm so glad to see i'm getting supporters, keep it coming guys![/ul]

item.title: Orical-X - Perfecting skilling!
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“halflive9, post:57, topic:388001”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=483818.msg3550551#msg3550551 date=1301486339]

I think he means Agility.

It’s very very easy. It just takes alot of time getting the right walk direction, distance, and the coords for the objects and adding in all the effects and stuff.

Oh, I’ll be releasing it soon.

[/quote]

oh wel but in the meantime i try it myself ;)[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Orical-X - Perfecting skilling!
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:44, topic:388001”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=483818.msg3546738#msg3546738 date=1301237178]

I’d like to start off with a blank source (no combat, skilling, ect.) and just make it all myself. Though I don’t like how there’s like 30 folders in the Base Server topic.

Thats basically what I’m trying to do with my skilling.

Do you know any good source to use like my description?

Runesource/Stonefall maybe? Or a Hyperion. Those are the only cleaned bases I know of.

Those all have like 20 folders, so confusingggg.

If you want something really bare that is delta, use my DeltaWiped, I’ll be releasing 1/2 weeks
But it’s really bare, although it has lots of tutorials in notepads to start teaching people how to build off of bare servers, I’ll be releasing a packaged and non-packaged version of them so you can choose.

If you are willing to wait awhile, then I’ll release Cortex, it’s basically DeltaWiped but with actual content.

Both these projects were deviants of Rune Rebirth, even though I lost the passion for that, I still have it burning for these two.

Wow, ok, sorry for derailing your topic Nick<3

ontopic: Yes! The server is very impressive! Some things I was truly amazed by were: Agility, Combat, Models/Animations, Nick raging at me xD.
Truly amazing, I’ll have pictures tomorrow.

Tell me more about DeltaWiped.

You should talk through private message

P.S Added the agility course vid if anyone wants to see it…
[/quote]
Link me on msn[/quote]

Posted it on the thread but ok O.o

Read full topic

item.title: Orical-X - Perfecting skilling!
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

They’re aren’t that confusing if you take time to learn. Some of it you don’t really need to edit, such as net, event and util. model and world are the main ones I’d say, model being everything you need for players/items/objects/npcs. There you got the packets folder in players which handles all your clicking objects etc. and then the manager files for spawning objects/npc handling stuff.

model/players.*; is just your Client.java spread out basically.

Read full topic
